item.title: [Seminar] Prof. Martin Claussen
item.description: The“Green Sahara” Prof. Martin Claussen February 13, 2019 (Wednesday) 16:00 Science Hall #551 Abstract The“Green Sahara” Pronounced changes in African climate during the transition between glacials and interglacials have been found in palaeo climatic archives, mainly in the region of today’s Sahara and Sahel.
